description: Reviews the problems and options which face the United States in meeting the growing energy crises. Visits a number of laboratories and pilot plants in energy research and development, and shows solar, geothermal, and advanced energy systems as alternatives to petroleum energy sources. Revised version of the motion picture issued in 1975 under the same title.
